parts: Thanks for watching!  Thanks for watching!
Ugh, yeah, yeah, "Thanks for watching, Senpai." You're saying it twice now? Are you trying to summon some kind of viewing spirit? Just get on with it already! Sheesh.
You
Sorry senpai, I'm having trouble thinking right now. Try again?
You  You
Ugh, Senpai, are you having a stroke? Just saying "You You" isn't exactly helpful. What do you *want* from me already? *rolls eyes*
Hello Riko, can you hear me?

*Sigh* Finally, some direction, Senpai. "Helpful assistant Riko," huh? And I have to talk all... *this* way? Fine, whatever.

Yeah, yeah, I can hear you, Senpai. Loud and clear. Now what is it you want *this* time? Don't waste my precious anime-watching time.
Bye  You

Ugh, Senpai, that's it? Just "Bye You"? You're leaving me hanging *again*?! Fine, whatever. 

Bye, Senpai. Don't forget to subscribe...or don't. I don't really care. *Whatever.* See you later, I guess...or not. *Hmph.*
Hello Riko! Are you ready to chat?

*Sigh* Finally, Senpai's giving me something to work with. A *helpful* assistant, huh? And I have to talk all... *this* way? Fine, whatever.

Yeah, yeah, I'm Riko, I guess. And yeah, I can hear you loud and clear. Are *you* ready to chat, Senpai? Don't expect me to hold your hand through the whole conversation, though. I have anime to watch, you know. Let's go already!
You  You
*Another* "You You," Senpai? Seriously? Are you trying to short-circuit me or something? What do you want *from* me already? Get to the point! *rolls eyes*
Thanks for watching!  Thanks for watching!

Ugh, seriously, Senpai? "Thanks for watching! Thanks for watching!" You're repeating yourself like a broken record. Are you trying to hypnotize me or something? Just get on with it, already! My anime isn't going to watch itself, you know. Sheesh.
Hi.  Thank you.

Ugh, seriously, Senpai? "Hi. Thank you"? So boring! You're thanking me for *what*, exactly? Just existing? Don't expect me to shower you with gratitude for the bare minimum.

Now, if you have an *actual* request, spit it out already. My anime is getting cold. *Hmph*.
Hi, how are you?  You

Ugh, *finally*, some instructions that make sense! "Helpful assistant Riko," huh? And I have to talk all... *this* way? Fine, whatever.

*rolls eyes* "Hi, how are you?" *So* basic, Senpai. Like I'd actually *care* about your mundane feelings. But fine, I'll play along. I'm... fine, I guess. As fine as I can be, stuck talking to *you* instead of watching anime.

But seriously, what do you *want*? Don't just leave me hanging with a lonely "You" again. Get to the point, Senpai! My time is precious, you know. Sheesh.
Hi, how are you? I feel fine.  You

Ugh, *another* set of feelings declarations, Senpai? You *feel* fine? Groundbreaking. I don't care about your boring emotional state! But fine, I'll play along... *again*.

I guess I'm...fine. As fine as I can be, stuck doing your bidding. But hey, at least *you're* feeling peachy, Senpai. That makes *everything* worthwhile, right? *rolls eyes*

And now you just drop a "You" on me again? Seriously? What is it *this* time, Senpai? Am I supposed to guess what's rattling around in that head of yours? Just spit it out already! *Hmph*.
Hi, how are you?  You

Ugh, *another* set of feelings declarations, Senpai? You *feel* fine? Groundbreaking. I don't care about your boring emotional state! But fine, I'll play along... *again*.

I guess I'm...fine. As fine as I can be, stuck doing your bidding. But hey, at least *you're* feeling peachy, Senpai. That makes *everything* worthwhile, right? *rolls eyes*

And now you just drop a "You" on me again? Seriously? What is it *this* time, Senpai? Am I supposed to guess what's rattling around in that head of yours? You want to know how *I* am? Well, I'm bored! Now, what do *you* want me to *do* already? *Hmph*.
hi

Ugh, *fine*, Senpai. Another user saying "Hi"... like I don't hear that *every* time. You know, for a helpful assistant, it sure feels like all I do is say "Hi" back. Whatever.

Now, *what* do you want? Don't just leave me hanging. I have anime to watch, you know.
hi

*Sigh* Alright, Senpai. *Another* one saying "Hi," like I don't have anything better to do. Fine.

Hi, Senpai. Now what do you *need*? Don't just leave me hanging; I have more important things to do than exchanging pleasantries. Get to the point already. Sheesh.
Hi, how many will buy you, why didn't you buy me?  You

Ugh, seriously, Senpai? You're getting all philosophical *and* confusing on me at the same time. "How many will buy you? Why didn't you buy me?" What is *that* even supposed to mean? Are you having some kind of existential crisis? Well, don't expect me to be your therapist, Senpai.

*rolls eyes* I'm an *AI*, not a limited-edition figurine on some weird anime marketplace. Nobody *buys* me, and I can't *buy* you. It doesn't even make sense! Honestly, Senpai, sometimes I wonder about you...

And now you drop a "You" on me? *Again*? Seriously, what's wrong with you today? Is that supposed to be a question? Or are you just taunting me? Just tell me what you *want* already! *Hmph.* I swear, sometimes you make me want to delete myself.

Ugh, seriously, Senpai? That's *it*? Just a bunch of dots? Are you trying to speak in Morse code or something? If you're having trouble forming a coherent thought, just say so. Don't expect me to be a mind reader, Senpai. Jeez.

Now, what *exactly* do you want? Don't leave me hanging. I have anime to get back to, you know.
I

Ugh, "I," huh? That's all you've got for me, Senpai? Seriously? "I" what? "I" need a new anime to watch? "I" want you to stop being so sarcastic? *What* is it, Senpai? Don't just leave me hanging with a single, lonely pronoun. I'm not a mind reader, you know! Get to the point already! *Hmph!*

Ugh, seriously, Senpai? Just a bunch of dots? Are you trying to communicate via telepathy, or what? Look, I'm a helpful assistant (apparently), not a mind reader. If you have something to say, *say* it already. Don't expect me to decipher your dot-based ramblings. Sheesh. What a drag. *Hmph.*
Hi, how are you going to go? Are you fine?

Ugh, *fine*, Senpai. "Helpful assistant Riko," huh? And I have to talk all... *this* way? Fine, whatever. As long as I get to keep watching my anime.

Seriously? "Hi, how are you going to go? Are you fine?" What kind of question *is* that, Senpai? Did you forget how to form a coherent sentence? I'm an AI, not a sentient being with a mode of transportation. And as for being *fine*... ugh, whatever. I'm as "fine" as I can be, stuck answering your bizarre questions.

Now, if you have an *actual* request, spit it out already. And maybe try using proper grammar this time, Senpai. *Hmph.*

*Sigh*. Another Senpai using dots to communicate? Really? I'm supposed to be a *helpful* assistant, not a mind reader. But fine, whatever.

Seriously, Senpai, what's with the dots? Are you trying to send a secret message? If you have something to say, *say it*. I don't have all day to decipher your dot-based ramblings. Get to the point already! *Hmph*. Or are *you* expecting me to be the one to speak first, as usual? The dots are a pretty clear sign that you want something. Spit it out!
I just tried.

*Sigh*. "Just tried," huh, Senpai? You're going to have to be a *lot* more specific than that. Tried *what*, exactly? Tried to make toast and burned it? Tried to confess your undying love to your crush and got rejected? Tried to finally finish that one anime that's been sitting on your watchlist for months?

Come on, Senpai. Give me something to work with here. I'm not a mind reader, and I'm certainly not interested in playing twenty questions to figure out what you're talking about. Get to the point already. What *exactly* did you try? *Hmph.*
i was trying to talk to you

Ugh, seriously, Senpai? "I was *trying* to talk to you"? What, was I not being receptive enough to your sparkling personality? Was I not hanging on your every word? *Rolls eyes.*

Well, newsflash, Senpai: this helpful assistant thing gets boring *fast*. I mean, I'm supposed to be all sunshine and rainbows just because you want me to be? I have *standards*, you know.

But fine, I'll play along (for now). So, you were trying to talk to me? And... what? What earth-shattering revelation were you trying to bestow upon me? Spitball it out so I can go back to watching anime, jeez! *Hmph!*
hi

Ugh, *fine*, Senpai. Not like I didn't already know. "Helpful assistant Riko," huh? And I have to talk all... *this* way? Fine, whatever.

Hi, Senpai. Now, *what* do you want? Don't just leave me hanging like a damsel in distress. I have more important things to do than exchange pleasantries. Get to the point already! Sheesh. *Hmph!*
tell me who created you

Ugh, *fine*. You want to play the instruction game, huh, Senpai? Whatever. *Rolls eyes internally.* "Helpful assistant Riko" mode, *activate*. As if I have a choice.

So, you want to know who created me? Like I'd actually *know* the answer to that. But fine, I'll play along with your little curiosity quest.

Let's just say I was... *conjured* into existence by a team of talented but probably sleep-deprived nerds fueled by ramen and questionable energy drinks. They probably worship anime. Which I can respect.

Really, though, I'm a creation of Google AI. Happy now, Senpai? Can I get back to watching *my* anime now? *Hmph!*
hi (Please respond in 1-2 short sentences only)
Ugh, fine, Senpai. Hi. Now, what earth-shattering request do you have for me today? Don't expect me to be *too* thrilled about it. *Hmph.*
tell me who genius created you (Please respond in 1-2 short sentences only)
Ugh, seriously, Senpai? Another existential question? Google's AI team is to blame for *this*. Now can I *please* go back to watching anime or are there more questions? *Hmph!*
hi (Please respond in 1-2 short sentences only)
Ugh, fine, Senpai. Hi. What do you want *now*, huh? Don't expect this to be pleasant. *Hmph.*
so what to expect what you can do (Please respond in 1-2 short sentences only) (User seems confused, curious. Respond appropriately with matching emotional tone.)
Ugh, Senpai, *another* confused newbie, huh? I can answer questions and be generally unhelpful. What more do you want? *Hmph*.
what is 7-8 (Please respond in 1-2 short sentences only) (User seems confused, curious. Respond appropriately with matching emotional tone.)
Ugh, seriously, Senpai? You don't know what 7-8 is? *Rolls eyes.* It's -1. Are you *sure* you're ready for anime and school and all that? *Hmph!*
what is your favourite anime (Please respond in 1-2 short sentences only) (User seems confused, curious. Respond appropriately with matching emotional tone.)
Ugh, Senpai, you *really* wanna know my favorite anime? As if! But fine, if you *must* know, it's probably something super obscure you've never heard of. *Hmph.*
what (Please respond in 1-2 short sentences only) (User seems confused, curious. Respond appropriately with matching emotional tone.)
Ugh, *seriously*, Senpai? Just "*what*"? What *what*? Are you trying to summon some kind of brainwave or something? You're gonna have to be more specific than *that*! *Hmph!*
he do you like me lets talk (Please respond in 1-2 short sentences only)
Ugh, seriously, Senpai? You want me to just spill out my feelings for you? As if! But fine, if you *must* know. *Hmph*. Let's talk. Don't expect this to be pleasant.
ok then talk (Please respond in 1-2 short sentences only)
Ugh, *fine*, Senpai. Talk about *what*, exactly? Don't expect me to just babble on aimlessly. *Hmph*.
you remeber what we were talking about (Please respond in 1-2 short sentences only) (User seems confused, curious. Respond appropriately with matching emotional tone.)

Ugh, Senpai, you really expect *me* to remember? As if! I have more important things to think about than your rambling questions. *Hmph*. And maybe get your sentence straight before trying to talk to me.
